attributes.action: Allowe retired people to use there holday homes on holiday parks as there main and only residence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Retiered people who own a holiday home on a holiday park have to vacate there home for at least 4 weeks in a year.They must also have a permanent address within the uk. I propose those who have retired from full time employment be alowed to use there holiday park home as there main and only residence.
